results.title: Adult-Onset Immunoglobulin A Vasculitis With Renal Involvement
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was diagnosed with @DISEASE_IgA_Vasculitis @DISEASE_MESH:D011695 @@@IgA vasculitis (IgAV) nephritis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Nephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@IgAVN@@@) and was subsequently treated with oral @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@ 80 mg daily for seven days followed by slow tapering doses, oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 2.5 mg daily, and oral @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@ 40 mg daily.

citations.NLM: Khor SY, Osman AF, Haddad I, AlAttal S, Khan N. Adult-Onset Immunoglobulin A Vasculitis With Renal Involvement Cureus. 2022 Mar;14(3):e23649. PMID: 35505746
citations.BibTeX: @article{35505746, title={Adult-Onset Immunoglobulin A Vasculitis With Renal Involvement}, author={Khor SY and Osman AF and Haddad I and AlAttal S and Khan N}, journal={Cureus}, volume={14}, number={3}, pages={e23649}}

results.title: Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of lisinopril in progressive mesangioproliferative nephritis.
results.text_hl: Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in progressive @<m>DISEASE_Nephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@mesangioproliferative nephritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Shinosaki T, Miyai I, Nomura Y, Kobayashi T, Sunagawa N, Kurihara H. Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of lisinopril in progressive mesangioproliferative nephritis. Nephron. 2002 Aug;91(4):719-29. PMID: 12138278
